articles.description: A Singaporean woman, who was infected with the novel coronavirus in March when she was pregnant, has given birth to a baby with antibodies against the virus, offering a new clue as to whether the infection can be transferred from mother to child.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff

articles.author: ET HealthWorld
articles.title: 25M couples in India couldn't access contraceptives due to Covid - ETHealthworld.com
articles.description: The report highlighted that the global AIDS response was off track before the Covid-19 pandemic hit, but the rapid spread of the coronavirus has created additional setbacks.
articles.content: Geneva: The Covid-19pandemic interrupted contraceptive access for an estimated over 25 million couples in India, said a report by the Joint United Nations Programme on HIV/AIDS (UNAIDS).Health offici… [+2067 chars]
